import React from 'react' import { Cart3, Heart, PersonCircle, PlusLg } from 'react-bootstrap-icons' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { setIsVisibCard } from '../../redux/slices/Visib' import { selectIsAuth } from '../../redux/slices/Auth' import { Logo } from '../../assets' import './Header.scss' const Header = () => { const isAuth = useSelector(selectIsAuth) const { cartItems } = useSelector(state => state.cart) const [totalPrice, setTotalPrice] = React.useState(0) const dispatch = useDispatch() const onVisibCart = () => dispatch(setIsVisibCard(true)) React.useEffect(() => { cartItems && cartItems.forEach(item => setTotalPrice(+item.price)) }, [cartItems]) return (

) } export default Header
